content.title: Goals of Care ICU
content.statement: Goals of Care ICU is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Critical-Care that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Goals of Care ICU helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Goals of Care ICU include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Goals of Care ICU.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts

sources.source: UpToDate. (2024). Goals of Care ICU. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
